title: Forevermark Introduces Capricci, the Nose Pin Collection
text:
Thursday, October 15, 2015 3:18PM IST (9:48AM GMT) Forevermark Introduces Capricci, the Nose Pin Collection Mumbai, Maharashtra, India 
Forevermark, the diamond brand with a unique inscription assuring that every diamond meets exceptional standards of beauty, rarity and is responsibly sourced, is pleased to introduce Capricci, The Nose Pin Collection. Developed around the idea of “Wear What You Feel”, Capricci, The Nose Pin Collection offers an innovative and luxury design encouraging women to express their creativity and emotions in an elegant and subtle way. Capricci is presented with seven exclusive jackets to suit women any day of the week. Each jacket shape reflects a different feeling. The jackets can be interchanged and worn as different nose pins. Alternatively, the jackets can also be attached as charms to the bracelet. The Flywheel jacket has been designed to represent energy and enthusiasm while the Heart jacket suggests feelings of love and romance. A gift of nature like a Forevermark diamond, the Flower jacket embodies natural beauty. The Hexagon embodies their strategic and powerful mind. The Crescent Moon jacket relates to a sense of peace and tranquillity. The Star is the perfect accessory to sparkle in the evening. The Butterfly jacket, another connection to nature’s beauty, represents the playfulness and freedom of the mind. Women will find in each jacket an intimate way to express their own feeling, giving them their own individual interpretation. Set with beautiful Forevermark diamonds, Capricci embellishes women’s beauty with originality and elegance. A must-have to develop different looks from casual to evening wear, women will find with Capricci a new way to express their individuality. The collection is a delicate and fun piece of jewellery that can accessorise both casual and formal outfits and can be worn effortlessly from day to night. India has a long tradition of adornment. Noise pins are the most favoured ornament after rings. Capricci nose pin is a piece of jewellery that has been designed for Indian women to be worn with pride and joy . The complete collection comprises one classic diamond nose pin, two diamond stud earrings and one charm bracelet. The diamond at the heart of the collection embodies the journey that makes each diamond and moreover each woman unique. Capricci, The Nose Pin Collection is available in Authorised Forevermark Jewellers. ABOUT FOREVERMARK Every Forevermark diamond undergoes a journey of rigorous selection. Less than one percent of the world’s diamonds are worthy of the Forevermark inscription. The unique inscription is an assurance that every Forevermark diamond meets the exceptional standards of beauty, rarity and is responsibly sourced. Forevermark is the diamond brand from The De Beers Group of Companies and benefits from over 125 years of diamond expertise. Forevermark diamonds are carefully selected and come from sources committed to high standards; they are beautifully crafted by a select group of Diamantaires and exclusively available from select Authorised Forevermark Jewellers. FOREVERMARK INSCRIPTION & GRADING Invisible to the naked eye, the inscription is made using bespoke technology from The De Beers Group of Companies. It is also recorded on the personalised Forevermark identification card which comes with every Forevermark diamond. The actual size of the inscription is just 1/5000th the width of a human hair and can only be seen using a special Forevermark viewer which can be found in Authorised Forevermark Jewellers. It is confirmed by leading gemmological institutes that the Forevermark inscription does not affect the internal quality of a diamond in any way. Authorised Forevermark Jewellers are able to provide a Forevermark Diamond Grading Report. It is an accurate blueprint of the qualities - cut, colour, clarity and caratage of each Forevermark diamond. The Forevermark Diamond Grading Report also features the individual identification number inscribed on the diamond and a specifically designed security hologram, providing reassurance that the Forevermark Diamond Grading Report is valid and genuine. For more information and to find your nearest Authorised Forevermark Jeweller offering Forevermark Grading Reports, go to www.forevermark.com .
